description:
Do you like to write? I do. I love writing. I like it so much that sometimes I’ve wanted to write more, and more and more. But life happens. Work has always been a priority in my life. My first job was in a fast food restaurant. Then I worked at the zoo with animals and as a teacher for several years. Until I made a life changing decision: to work as a writer. I thought: “Hey, if I enjoy writing so much, I’d rather work as a writer for other people to get money AND improve my writing skills at the same time. And that’s what I’ve been doing: I’ve tried several freelance writing jobs and published my own books. Truth is, It’s been a very difficult journey with ups and downs, and it still is. But I’ve learned so many interesting facts and practices about the job that you’ll be thrilled to know if you want to be a full time writer too.

Hi! My name is Manuel Arnedo and I’m an Author and an Entrepreneur who helps thousands of writers improve their skills. This course is about becoming a Writerpreneur, that is, about writing for a living. First, you’ll learn how to make money online as a freelance writer, create irresistible proposals to get hired in the best platforms, get quality customers and beat the competition. Secondly, you’ll learn how to write high quality books that people pay for, so that you can get passive income while you sleep. Finally, I’ll teach you how to manage your sales so that you can focus your efforts just on writing while other professionals do the tasks required to develop your best projects ever.

Most of the lessons are designed so that you can take instant action after watching them. That means you can start your professional writer career as soon as today.

If you follow the instructions step by step it is impossible that you don’t see the benefits. Plus, this course has 30 day money back guarantee, so there’s much to gain and nothing to lose.

Are you ready to turn your pen into pennies? Welcome!
title: Writerpreneur: Start your Writing Career
